NodeOS Node.js Powered Operating System

Linux Kernel

NodeOS leverages the strength of the linux kernel

NodeJS Runtime

Node is the primary runtime — no bash here

NPM Packages

NodeOS uses NPM as its primary package manager

Github Community

NodeOS discussion and planning through Github
